mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(mewsinsa_id, password, name, nickname, email, phone, profile_image, tier_id, is_admin, range_of_notification, points) VALUES(#{mewsinsaId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{profileImage}, #{tierId}, #{isAdmin}, "1", #{points})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, mewsinsa_id AS mewsinsaId, password, name, nickname, email, phone, profile_image AS profileImage, tier_id AS tierId, is_admin AS isAdmin, points FROM member WHERE email = #{userEmail}
